scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run dev:backend in one terminal and npm run dev:frontend in another'
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
